attributes.action: Ambulance staff demand a apology from Richard Madeley and Ann Widdecombe
attributes.additional_details:
Richard Madeley and Ann Widdecombe should be forced to apologise to all ambulance staff especially WMAS publicly for there disgusting lies regards  six-week-old Thomas Passant, of Bridgnorth, Shropshire, and his heart problems.
There allegations that a crew continued with there undisturbed break whilst this child lay very poorly without any Paramedic assistance is a complete lie and once they have found out the true facts of this case they should rewrite there respective columns free of charge for all to see
